description: Rate limiting configuration for web scrapers - prevents IP bans and respects site policies

yellow_pages.notes: PRIMARY data source - Yellow Pages is less aggressive than Google Maps, cleaner data structure for B2B prospecting.

google_maps.notes: FALLBACK source - Conservative limits - Google Maps is strict. Increase gradually if using quality proxies.

linkedin_company.notes: LinkedIn is very aggressive with rate limiting. Use residential proxies and authentic sessions.

linkedin_people.notes: Most restrictive - people searches trigger stronger anti-bot measures.

email_finder.notes: Less restrictive - most sites don't heavily rate limit email finder patterns.

global.notes: Global settings applied to all scrapers unless overridden

adjustment_guidelines.production: Start conservative, monitor for blocks, increase by 25% if no issues after 7 days
adjustment_guidelines.development: Use lower limits during testing to avoid wasting proxies and triggering blocks
adjustment_guidelines.premium_proxies: With residential proxies, you can increase all limits by 2-3x safely
adjustment_guidelines.datacenter_proxies: Keep limits conservative - datacenter IPs are easily detected and blocked
